h1_title: How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3
content: To leave the area, go to the back of the room near the locked gates and take the slope up to the left. Drop down here and you’ll be back near the first beam you crossed over.
promot:

The content is as follows:
To leave the area, go to the back of the room near the locked gates and take the slope up to the left. Drop down here and you’ll be back near the first beam you crossed over.
